ComicInfo.Summary:
Before history was recorded in stone and ink, some men wrote it in blood! Ellis and Wolfer, the writing team on Gravel, unveil the next six-issue barbaric epic of Wolfskin, this time joined by Gianluca Pagliarani, the star artist of Ignition City! One of the most graphic and meticulously detailed battle epics in comic book history is unveiled! As the village of Va is besieged by a gigantic, smoke-belching fire demon, Wolfskin and his fellow rescuers battle for their lives against the legendary beast which towers above them, crushing all in its path. And the earth-shaking terror has not arrived alone, ushering forth an overwhelming horde of demon warriors striking down all before them in a horrific orgy of blind fury and murder. But as long as a war hammer and sword remain in Wolfskin's iron-like grip, a glimmer of victory remains, even in the face of the apocalyptic End Times which have been foretold by the prophets of this ancient world. This all-new, full-color six issue series is available with several historic covers. Series artist Pagliarani provides the regular cover.
